alert.note: Alert for Colbert; Franklin; Lauderdale (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 06 at 5:09PM CDT by NWS Huntsville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Lauderdale, Colbert, Franklin and southwestern Lawrence Counties through 545 PM CDT... At 507 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a cluster of strong thunderstorms near Belgreen east to just south of the Muscle Shoals area, moving south at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Muscle Shoals, Russellville, Sheffield, Tuscumbia, Red Bay, Phil Campbell, Littleville, Leighton, Belgreen and Vina. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead ponding on area roadway and very localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
